cons: small town, cost of living very high. Not much training for management.

job_title: Cook/Food Service Worker in Mammoth Lakes, CA
pros: Pay and benefits...including paid time off.  Very comfortable place to work and people are generally friendly.  The surrounding area is beautiful with skiing, fishing, camping, hiking, rock climbing and bicycling.
cons: Menu item are adjusted by dietary manager without first testing the result. No room for advancement...pretty much a dead end job.

job_title: Lab Assistant in Mammoth Lakes, CA
pros: Friendly community, some really great employees.
cons: The cost of living is very high. Some employees who are not very good at their jobs get moved to another position which usually ends up being a promotion of sorts and higher paying (across all departments).

job_title: Project Manager in Mammoth Lakes, CA
pros: Small town so the thee is more of a community atmosphere. People are generally nicer.
cons: Contract was cut short. It also took time to get there.
